name: Pratik Goenka (pagoenka.github.io)
body: ### Welcome to my github page. This site lets you browse and showcase the work I author/contribute to. ### jQuery Pattern Lock plugin This is browser based pattern lock plugin similar to Pattern locks available in Android/iOS. [![GitHub Logo](/assets/images/patternLock_logo.PNG)](http://pagoenka.github.io/patternlock/) ### Conway's Game of Life Implemented [Conway's Game of Life](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway%27s_Game_of_Life) in very crude way using HTML,CSS and JS Seed the cells by clicking on them and then click on start. [![GitHub Logo](/assets/images/conways_logo.gif)](https://jsfiddle.net/pratik_goenka/27ggeqbg/12/embedded/result/) ### Support or Contact Mail me on pa.goenka@rediff.com or Follow @chikku39
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
